WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 07.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS BY M/V POLARCUS ALIMA
   TOWING 12 8100 METER LONG CABLES:
   A. 03 APR ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      35-41.92S 051-16.32W AND 35-29.58S 051-35.32W.
   B. 03 AND 04 APR ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      35-21.72S 051-27.67W AND 35-34.02S 051-08.68W.
   C. 04 APR ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      35-41.65S 051-16.07W AND 35-29.33S 051-35.07W.
   D. 04 APR ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      35-21.45S 051-27.42W AND 35-33.75S 051-08.43W.
   SIX MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1073/17.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 05 APR 17.
